messages.needToSpecifyACrew: Need to specify at least one crew
messages.willNeedToSpecifyAthletesDetails: Do not forget to specify athletes details before D-0
messages.requiredFieldsInvalid: Some of the required fields are invalid
messages.needToSpecifyACaptain: A captain shall be specified for each crew
messages.warningMembersCnt: Attention : it seem like some of the athletes are engaged in several crews. This is not accepted by the regatta rules.
messages.formValidated: The form is successfully submitted. Please check your mailbox for further instructions.

errors.invalidForm: The form is not filled in correctly. Please check it out and then submit again.

pdf.title: Régataiades Internationales de Nantes 2015
pdf.subtitle: 31th edition: 09 & 10 May 2015
pdf.details: After checking the information in this document, please contact us for the finalisation of your registration.

info.formDetails: The pre-registration form allows the registration of your team on the Régataïades event
info.coachesDetails: You can specify the coaches and staff being part of the team. This remains optional.
info.crewsDetails: You do not have to provide all of the athletes details in order to register a crew, but these details shall be given before the D-0.
